member.name: T:Conizi.Model.Shared.Attributes.ConiziAdditionalPropertiesAttribute
member.summary: Indicates if Additional Properties should allowed. Default is false

member.summary: Indicates if X- Properties should allowed. Default true

member.name: T:Conizi.Model.Shared.Entities.EdiAddress
member.summary: Address information of an object (e.g. sender or receiver)"

member.summary: Base class for all partner identification stuff. Used to allow combining schemas in a JSON Schema

member.summary: Information about the technical sender and receiver

member.name: P:Conizi.Model.Shared.Entities.EdiIdIdentification.EdiId
member.summary: Edi Id is used to identify the technical sender or receiver (e.g. CONIZVK)

member.name: T:Conizi.Model.Shared.Entities.EdiPartner
member.summary: Information about the sending or receiving partner

member.name: P:Conizi.Model.Shared.Entities.EdiPartner.PartnerId
member.summary: Partner Id is used to identify the real sender or receiver (e.g. 1234)

member.name: T:Conizi.Model.Shared.Entities.EdiConiziIdentification
member.summary: Information about the sending or receiving object on the conizi platform

member.name: P:Conizi.Model.Shared.Entities.EdiConiziIdentification.ConiziId
member.summary: Conizi Id is used to identify the sending or receiving Tenant/Site/App on the conizi platform
